infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to take photos for quiz grading.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to select images for quiz grading.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you select images for quiz grading.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your camera to let you take photos for quiz grading.
